channel.title: Materials on RISC-V @ HM
channel.description: Recent content in Materials on RISC-V @ HM

item.title: Computer Architecture
item.description: Here you can find slides for our lecture “Computer Architecture”. It is tailored for CS students in their second year, but are generally useful. Spring 2020 2 - Basics 📖 slides 🎞️ animated slides 3 - Pipelining 📖 slides 🎞️ animated slides 4 - Complex Pipelining 📖 slides 🎞️ animated slides
